title: Still Jittery: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Nov. 25, 2025

title: Metaplanet leans into Bitcoin debt play with fresh $130M to buy more BTC
contentSnippet: The fresh debt draw shows how Metaplanet is using both debt and preferred equity to accelerate Bitcoin purchases and income-generation strategies.

title: Monad airdrop farmer spends full $112K MON reward on gas for failed trades
contentSnippet: A suspected airdrop farmer burned through their entire $112,000 of MON rewards in hundreds of failed transaction attempts.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin Leads Rebound, Altcoins Rally During Longer-Term Downturn
contentSnippet: Bitcoin recaptured $87,000 on Tuesday as improving risk appetite and a strong equities session helped lift major altcoins.

title: Strike CEO debanked by JPMorgan as Lummis sounds ‘Chokepoint 2.0’ alarm
contentSnippet: Strike CEO Jack Mallers said JPMorgan closed his accounts without explanation, reigniting fears of Operation Chokepoint 2.0 and renewed pressure on crypto companies.

title: Cameo Wins Temporary Restraining Order Against OpenAI
contentSnippet: A federal judge has temporarily blocked OpenAI from using "Cameo" or confusingly similar marks for its Sora AI video generation products.

title: Solana ETFs pull $369M in November as investors look to productive yield assets
contentSnippet: Solana ETFs have pulled in $369 million so far this month as investors appear to favor yield-bearing products, while Bitcoin and Ether ETFs faced billions in redemptions.

title: Metaplanet Draws $130M for Further Bitcoin Acquisitions Under Credit Facility
contentSnippet: The Japanese company executed new borrowing as part of its expanding bitcoin focused funding strategy.

title: UAE’s new financial law pulls DeFi and Web3 into regulatory scope
contentSnippet: Federal Decree Law No. 6 expands the UAE central bank’s authority over DeFi, ending the “just code” defense and imposing penalties of up to $272 million.

title: Bitcoin Faces $13.3B Monthly Options Expiry as BTC Trades Well Below Max Pain
contentSnippet: A sharp drawdown has pushed BTC towards heavy put positioning at $80,000 ahead of Friday’s expiry.

title: Bitcoin Faces Short Squeeze Risk Above $87K as Funding Rates Hint Local Bottom
contentSnippet: Derivatives metrics show rising bearish positioning followed by a sharp reduction in open interest, while price recovery hints at early squeeze dynamics.

title: Private Equity Firm Bridgepoint to Buy Majority of Crypto Audit Specialist ht.digital
contentSnippet: Bridgepoint did not disclose the financial terms of the deal. Sky News cited a figure of 200 million pounds ($262 million).

title: Pump.fun co-founder denies $436M cash out, claims it was ‘treasury management’
contentSnippet: The Pump.fun co-founder disputed claims of a massive off-ramp and said Pump.fun’s USDC shifts were routine treasury operations.

title: ギャラクシー・デジタル、ポリマーケットとカルシで流動性提供を検討＝ブルームバーグ
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨投資大手ギャラクシー・デジタルが予測市場プラットフォームのポリマーケットとカルシでマーケットメイカーとして流動性提供を検討。既に小規模実験を開始しており、機関投資家の参入で市場の成熟が加速する可能性。

title: ビットコイン急落の背景は　ETF・DAT・ステーブルコインの3大需要が逆転＝NYDIGレポート
contentSnippet: NYDIGは最新レポートでビットコイン急落の本質を明らかにした。ETF資金流出、DAT企業のプレミアム崩壊、ステーブルコイン供給減少という3大需要源の反転により、強気サイクルを支えた自己強化型ループが破綻したことが大きく影響している。

title: ソラナとXRPのETFが好調　資金フローの明暗が鮮明に
contentSnippet: ビットコイン・イーサリアムETFが週次で大幅流出する一方、ソラナとXRPの現物ETFは資金流入を維持。20日連続流入のSOLや週次トップのXRPなど、資金フローの明暗を比較する。

title: Monad’s Debut Shows Why FDV Forecasts Broke as Bitcoin Fell
contentSnippet: Monad’s listing illustrates how low-float launches can anchor valuation even when macro conditions point in the opposite direction, leaving traders mispricing outcomes that hinge more on supply than o

title: CMEグループ、仮想通貨先物・オプション取引高が過去最高を更新
contentSnippet: CMEグループが11月21日に暗号資産先物・オプション取引で過去最高の79万4,903件を記録。年初来の平均取引高は前年比132%増となり、機関投資家の参入拡大と市場成熟を示す。

title: Exodus taps Bitcoin holdings to fund $175M move into onchain payments
contentSnippet: Exodus is using its Bitcoin reserves to back a $175 million acquisition of W3C Corp, bringing Monavate and Baanx under its roof as it expands into onchain payments.

title: Bitcoin at $87K: BTC buying opportunity or dead cat bounce?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin price tools returned to levels last seen several years ago as calls for a BTC price relief rally continued to grow louder.

title: Japan’s FSA to Mandate Liability Reserves for Crypto Exchanges to Enhance Security: Report
contentSnippet: Japan's Financial Services Agency is set to require digital asset exchanges to maintain liability reserves to protect users.

title: KuCoin Registers With Austrac to Operate in Australia, Adds Fiat On-Ramps
contentSnippet: The registration comes as Australian regulators tighten scrutiny on offshore crypto platforms, with ASIC stating that many digital assets may require licensing to operate.

title: DOGE Pops 5% as ETF Debut Sparks First Clear Reversal Signal in Weeks
contentSnippet: ETF analysts characterized the launch as another major inflection point for memecoin legitimacy, with early volume estimates near $11 million.

title: SEC、Fuseエナジートークンを証券非該当と判断　実用型トークンに新たな道筋
contentSnippet: SECが英Fuse Energyの実用型トークンを証券非該当と判断し、ノーアクションレターを発行。DePIN分野の規制明確化が進む中、市場規模は190億ドル（約2.9兆円）に達し、前年比270%の急成長を記録。

title: Berachain disputes ‘framing’ of a $25M refund deal to Brevan Howard
contentSnippet: Berachain’s founder says a report that it gave one of its Series B investors a year-long refund right on its $25 million investment is both “inaccurate and incomplete.”

title: ‘OG whale’ who called the October crash has a $44.5M long on Ether
contentSnippet: The Hyperliquid whale that made $200 million in the October crash has just added another $10 million to its long position on Ether.

title: Japan's FSA to Require Crypto Exchanges Hold Liability Reserves for Losses Relating to Hacks
contentSnippet: Japan is seeking to restore trust in crypto markets after a decade of security failures, from Mt. Gox to the recent DMM Bitcoin hack.

title: 「プレミアムで取引されるデジタル資産トレジャリー企業は少数に」ビットワイズ見解
contentSnippet: ビットワイズCIOがビットコインなどを保有するDAT企業の今後を分析した。プレミアムを維持できるのは一部のみで、多くはディスカウント価格で取引されると予想している。

title: Bitcoin Rebounds Above $88K—Will It Last?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's weekend bounce is being supported by orderly derisking, a drop in bearish options hedging, and steady institutional conviction.

title: Binance Faces Fresh Lawsuit Over Alleged Hamas Transactions
contentSnippet: A court filing claims Binance’s structure and controls let users tied to U.S.-designated terrorist groups move funds through its exchange.

title: 中国、ビットコインマイニング世界3位に復活か　シェアの14%を占める＝ロイター
contentSnippet: ロイター通信によると、中国のビットコインマイニングシェアが2021年の全面禁止後に約14%まで回復し、世界第3位に返り咲いた。新疆や四川で余剰電力を活用した地下採掘活動が活発化。

title: JPモルガン、仮想通貨企業CEOの口座閉鎖か 「チョークポイント2.0」と波紋を呼ぶ
contentSnippet: ビットコイン決済アプリStrikeのCEOがJPモルガンの口座を閉鎖されたと訴えている。仮想通貨業界への銀行サービス拒否が続いている可能性が浮上し波紋を呼んでいる。

title: グレイスケール、XRP・ドージコインETFを上場開始　管理手数料は初期免除
contentSnippet: グレイスケールがXRP・ドージコイン現物ETFを11月24日にNYSE Arcaで上場開始。管理手数料0.35%、初回3カ月間または10億ドル到達まで無料。米国初の純粋なドージコイン現物ETFとして、キャナリー・キャピタル、ビットワイズに続く市場参入。アルトコインETF市場が急拡大中。

title: 米ビットコイン現物ETF、4週連続で資金が純流出　先週の純流出額は1900億円超
contentSnippet: 米上場の仮想通貨ビットコインの現物ETFは、先週の資金フローが約1,914億円の純流出だった。これで週次としては4週間連続で純流出となったが、ポジティブな見方も上がっている。

title: Musk Says Real-World Data From X and Tesla to Drive AGI Efforts
contentSnippet: SpaceX's CEO, Elon Musk, said Tesa’s fleet and X’s live data are providing him with training inputs that competitors lack.

title: Bitcoin Heist: Family Members Waterboarded, Sexually Assaulted as Attackers Steal $1.6 Million
contentSnippet: Horrific details of a Bitcoin wrench attack in Canada were revealed, with victims held hostage, waterboarded, and sexually assaulted.

title: SEC Clears Fuse Energy Token in Win for US Crypto ‘Regulatory Clarity’
contentSnippet: The SEC has granted no-action relief to Fuse’s rewards token, saying its value stems from consumer use rather than investment potential.

title: Trump Signs 'Genesis Mission' Executive Order to Use AI to Supercharge US Innovation
contentSnippet: Trump's latest order aims to fuse federal data, supercomputing, and AI to speed discoveries across energy, biology, and national security.

title: Bitcoin Giant Strategy Skips Bitcoin Buy With Stock Down 67% From Peak
contentSnippet: The Bitcoin-buying firm has a habit of announcing purchases on Monday.

title: XRP Jumps as Franklin Templeton Debuts Latest Crypto ETF
contentSnippet: The Franklin XRP fund comes less than two weeks after the successful start of a Canary Capital XRP ETF.
